name: docsmith
description: DocSmith: Document management and workspace collaboration app.
author: Perry Chapman

scripts.build:backend: powershell -Command "Remove-Item backend/dist -Recurse -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue" && tsc -p backend/tsconfig.json && xcopy "backend\src\db\*.sql" "backend\dist\db\" /Y && echo {"type":"commonjs"} > backend/dist/package.json
scripts.build:electron: tsc electron/main.ts --outDir electron --target es2020 --module es2020 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop && tsc electron/preload.ts --outDir electron --target es2020 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c yellow,cyan "npm:dev:backend" "npm --workspace frontend run dev"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:electron && npm --workspace frontend run build
scripts.electron:dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend,electron -c yellow,cyan,magenta "npm:dev:backend" "npm --workspace frontend run dev" "electron ."
